fields.description:
KitchenSink: Controls > Text Filed > Keyboard, appropriate keyboard is not invoked
It works fine on SDK: 3.1.3.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Press each button then focus textfield

Expected:
Appropriate Keyboard should appear.

Actual:
After clicking 'Phone Pad', only number keypad is opened in all cases including when trying to invoke ascii keyboard
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: Controls > Text Field > Keyboard, appropriate keyboard is not invoked
